SQL.LOAD: SELECT rw.claimload_recon_wrk_id, rw.claimload_file_processed_id, rw.reject_code, rw.reject_reason, rw.claim_loaded, rw.dealer_id, rw.record_type, rw.dealer_code, rw.certificate, rw.claim_type, rw.authorization_num, rw.external_created_date, rw.coverage_code, rw.date_of_loss, rw.cause_of_loss, rw.problem_description, rw.comments, rw.special_instructions, rw.reason_closed, rw.manufacturer, rw.model, rw.serial_number, rw.service_center_code, rw.invoice_number, rw.amount, rw.estimate_amount, rw.product_code, rw.defect_reason, rw.repair_code, rw.caller_name, rw.contact_name, rw.created_by, rw.created_date, rw.modified_by, rw.modified_date, rw.repair_date, rw.visit_date, rw.pickup_date, rw.cert_id, rw.cert_item_cov_id, rw.original_claim_id, rw.service_center_id, rw.police_report_num, rw.officer_name, rw.police_station_code, rw.document_type, rw.rg_number, rw.document_agency, rw.document_issue_date, rw.id_type, rw.reject_msg_parms, rw.device_reception_date, rw.replacement_type, rw.replacement_manufacturer, rw.replacement_model, rw.replacement_serial_number, rw.replacement_sku, rw.deductible_collected, rw.labor_amount, rw.parts_amount, rw.service_amount, rw.shipping_amount, rw.part_1_sku, rw.part_1_description, rw.part_2_sku, rw.part_2_description, rw.part_3_sku, rw.part_3_description, rw.part_4_sku, rw.part_4_description, rw.part_5_sku, rw.part_5_description, rw.service_level, rw.dealer_reference, rw.pos, rw.problem_found, rw.final_status, rw.technical_report, rw.delivery_date, rw.batch_number, rw.incoming_entire_record, rw.comment_type_id, rw.comment_type, rw.tracking_number, rw.claim_authorization_id, rw.invoice_date, rw.risk_type_english, rw.item_description, rw.trip_amount, rw.other_amount, rw.other_explanation, rw.claim_number, rw.extended_status_code, rw.extended_status_date, rw.tracking_num_to_cust, rw.tracking_num_to_sc, rw.device_shipped_to_sc_date, rw.deductible_included FROM elp_claimload_recon_wrk rw WHERE claimload_recon_wrk_id = hextoraw(:claimload_recon_wrk_id)
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT rw.claimload_file_processed_id, rw.reject_code, nvl((SELECT TRANSLATION FROM ELP_LABEL innerL Inner join elp_dict_item_translation innert on innert.DICT_ITEM_ID = innerl.DICT_ITEM_ID and innert.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id WHERE innerL.ui_prog_code = l.ui_prog_code) , rw.reject_reason) as reject_reason, rw.claim_loaded, rw.dealer_id, rw.record_type, rw.dealer_code, rw.certificate, rw.claim_type, rw.authorization_num, rw.external_created_date, rw.coverage_code, rw.date_of_loss, rw.cause_of_loss, rw.problem_description, rw.comments, rw.special_instructions, rw.reason_closed, rw.manufacturer, rw.model, rw.serial_number, rw.service_center_code, rw.invoice_number, rw.amount, rw.estimate_amount, rw.product_code, rw.defect_reason, rw.repair_code, rw.caller_name, rw.contact_name, rw.created_by, rw.created_date, rw.modified_by, rw.modified_date, rw.repair_date, rw.visit_date, rw.pickup_date, rw.cert_id, rw.cert_item_cov_id, rw.original_claim_id, rw.service_center_id, rw.police_report_num, rw.officer_name, rw.police_station_code, rw.document_type, rw.rg_number, rw.document_agency, rw.document_issue_date, rw.id_type, rw.reject_msg_parms, rw.device_reception_date, rw.replacement_type, rw.replacement_manufacturer, rw.replacement_model, rw.replacement_serial_number, rw.replacement_sku, rw.deductible_collected, rw.labor_amount, rw.parts_amount, rw.service_amount, rw.shipping_amount, rw.service_level, rw.dealer_reference, rw.pos, rw.problem_found, rw.final_status, technical_report, rw.delivery_date, rw.claimload_recon_wrk_id, mc.MSG_PARAMETER_COUNT, rw.batch_number, rw.comment_type, rw.comment_type_id, rw.tracking_number, rw.invoice_date, rw.risk_type_english, rw.item_description, rw.trip_amount, rw.other_amount, rw.other_explanation, rw.claim_number, rw.extended_status_code, rw.extended_status_date, rw.tracking_num_to_cust, rw.tracking_num_to_sc, rw.device_shipped_to_sc_date, rw.deductible_included FROM elp_claimload_recon_wrk rw INNER JOIN ELP_CLAIMLOAD_FILE_PROCESSED fp on fp.CLAIMLOAD_FILE_PROCESSED_ID = rw.CLAIMLOAD_FILE_PROCESSED_ID left outer join ( select MSG_CODE, LABEL_ID, MSG_PARAMETER_COUNT From elp_message_code inner join ELP_LIST_ITEM li ON msg_type = li.LIST_ITEM_ID AND li.code = 'CLREJECT' INNER JOIN ELP_LIST l ON l.LIST_ID = li.LIST_ID AND l.code = 'MSGTYPE' ) mc on mc.MSG_CODE = rw.reject_code left outer join elp_label l on l.label_id = mc.label_id WHERE fp.FILENAME = :filename and reject_reason IS NOT NULL
SQL.LOAD_BY_CLAIM_LOAD_FILE_PROCESSED_ID: select claimload_recon_wrk_id, claimload_file_processed_id, reject_code, reject_reason, claim_loaded, dealer_id, record_type, dealer_code, certificate, claim_type, authorization_num, external_created_date, coverage_code, date_of_loss, cause_of_loss, problem_description, comments, special_instructions, reason_closed, manufacturer, model, serial_number, service_center_code, invoice_number, amount, estimate_amount, product_code, defect_reason, repair_code, caller_name, contact_name, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, repair_date, visit_date, pickup_date, cert_id, cert_item_cov_id, original_claim_id, service_center_id, police_report_num, officer_name, police_station_code, document_type, rg_number, document_agency, document_issue_date, id_type, reject_msg_parms, device_reception_date, replacement_type, replacement_manufacturer, replacement_model, replacement_serial_number, replacement_sku, deductible_collected, labor_amount, parts_amount, service_amount, shipping_amount, part_1_sku, part_1_description, part_2_sku, part_2_description, part_3_sku, part_3_description, part_4_sku, part_4_description, part_5_sku, part_5_description, service_level, dealer_reference, pos, problem_found, final_status, technical_report, delivery_date, batch_number, incoming_entire_record, comment_type_id, comment_type, tracking_number, claim_authorization_id, invoice_date, risk_type_english, item_description, trip_amount, other_amount, other_explanation, claim_number, extended_status_code, extended_status_date, tracking_num_to_cust, tracking_num_to_sc, device_shipped_to_sc_date, deductible_included from elp_claimload_recon_wrk where claimload_file_processed_id = hextoraw(:claimload_file_processed_id)

SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_claimload_recon_wrk ( claimload_file_processed_id, reject_code, reject_reason, claim_loaded, dealer_id, record_type, dealer_code, certificate, claim_type, authorization_num, external_created_date, coverage_code, date_of_loss, cause_of_loss, problem_description, comments, special_instructions, reason_closed, manufacturer, model, serial_number, service_center_code, invoice_number, amount, estimate_amount, product_code, defect_reason, repair_code, caller_name, contact_name, repair_date, visit_date, pickup_date, cert_id, cert_item_cov_id, original_claim_id, service_center_id, police_report_num, officer_name, police_station_code, document_type, rg_number, document_agency, document_issue_date, id_type, reject_msg_parms, created_by, claimload_recon_wrk_id, batch_number, comment_type, comment_type_id, tracking_number, claim_authorization_id, invoice_date, risk_type_english, item_description, trip_amount, other_amount, other_explanation, claim_number, extended_status_code, extended_status_date, tracking_num_to_cust, tracking_num_to_sc, device_shipped_to_sc_date, deductible_included ) VALUES ( :claimload_file_processed_id, :reject_code, :reject_reason, :claim_loaded, :dealer_id, :record_type, :dealer_code, :certificate, :claim_type, :authorization_num, :external_created_date, :coverage_code, :date_of_loss, :cause_of_loss, :problem_description, :comments, :special_instructions, :reason_closed, :manufacturer, :model, :serial_number, :service_center_code, :invoice_number, :amount, :estimate_amount, :product_code, :defect_reason, :repair_code, :caller_name, :contact_name, :repair_date, :visit_date, :pickup_date, :cert_id, :cert_item_cov_id, :original_claim_id, :service_center_id, :police_report_num, :officer_name, :police_station_code, :document_type, :rg_number, :document_agency, :document_issue_date, :id_type, :reject_msg_parms, :created_by, :claimload_recon_wrk_id, :batch_number, :comment_type, :comment_type_id, :tracking_number, :claim_authorization_id, :invoice_date, :risk_type_english, :item_description, :trip_amount, :other_amount, SQL.DELETE: DELETE FROM elp_claimload_recon_wrk WHERE claimload_recon_wrk_id = hextoraw(:claimload_recon_wrk_id)
